DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Site caGrid Identifier java.lang.Integer
DataElement.preferredDefinition: One or more characters used to identify the location of a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  [Manually-curated]_Generic value domain for a primitive java dataype that is an Integer (32-bit two's complement).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: One or more characters used to identify the location of a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A healthcare organization, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.

Concepts.definition: A healthcare organization, an institution, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.

Property.preferredDefinition: The underlying services oriented architecture that supports caBIG. caGrid defines two types of "grid services" that can be registered as nodes on the grid: Data Services and Analytical Services. caGrid provides a standard infrastructure for bioinformaticians to advertise their services thru common metadata defined in Unified Modeling Language (UML) domain information model. caGrid infrastructure also provides strong semantic specification thru binding to description logic terminology concepts that can be used by users to discover new and interesting scientific information using semantically aware searches.:One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: The underlying services oriented architecture that supports caBIG. caGrid defines two types of "grid services" that can be registered as nodes on the grid: Data Services and Analytical Services. caGrid provides a standard infrastructure for bioinformaticians to advertise their services thru common metadata defined in Unified Modeling Language (UML) domain information model. caGrid infrastructure also provides strong semantic specification thru binding to description logic terminology concepts that can be used by users to discover new and interesting scientific information using semantically aware searches.
One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 8/26/09 - swap existing 2 concepts for Clinical Trial Study concept (C70777) 12/10/08 - replaced retired concept C15207 with C71104.  12/9/08 - released post VCDE Interim Silver Review changes.  10/5/08 - added concept to clarify that this is the caGrid identifier; released post NCIA Interim Rpt Changes;  9/17/07  DEC created to support DICOM task utilizing IE & DICOM Attribute terms.   Needed for NCIA model load.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a primitive java dataype that is an Integer (32-bit two's complement).

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

DataElement.changeDescription: 10/5/08 - added concept to clarify that this is the caGrid identifier; released post NCIA Interim Rpt Changes
